title: Service disruption due to track fault between Eunos and Paya Lebar

title_translations.zh-Hans: Eunos 和 Paya Lebar 之间因轨道故障导致的服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kerana kerosakan landasan antara Eunos dan Paya Lebar
title_translations.ta: Eunos மற்றும் Paya Lebar இடையே உள்ள தடப் பிழையால் சேவை சீர்குலைவு

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service from Eunos to Paya Lebar running well again.
Some trains from Eunos to Paya LEBAR moving slower due to track fault.Our staff are onsite.
Some trains from Eunos to Paya Leber moving slower due to track fault.Our staff are onsite.
